data.Name: Smokepurpp
data.Bio: Omar Pineiro (born May 15, 1997), known professionally as Smokepurpp (or Purpp), is an American rapper from Miami, Florida. Pineiro released his first music video "Itâ€™s Nothin" with Lil Ominous on September 23, 2014. Pineiro initially found success on the audio distribution platform SoundCloud in 2016. His earliest songs on SoundCloud date back to July of 2015. Popular associated acts include Lil Pump, XXXTENTACION, and Swag Hollywood. Smokepurpp and Lil Pump perform often together as Gucci Gang. Read more on Last.fm
